Title: Repeals section 75-0109 of the environmental conservation law, relating to the promulgation of regulations to achieve statewide greenhouse gas emissions reductions
Summary: Relates to the promulgation of regulations to achieve statewide greenhouse gas emissions reductions.
LawCode: Rpld ยง75-0109, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to repeal section 75-0109 of the environmental conservation law, relating to the promulgation of regulations to achieve statewide greenhouse gas emissions reductions
